sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.preferences

Class ResourcePreferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.preferences.ResourcePreferences

  • public final class ResourcePreferences
extends java.lang.Object
    Resource preferences. Supports both default and instance (actually used and stored) scopes.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pavol Zbell
